artifacts.summary: Analysis of multi-family saturation construction to remove singleFamily_modal_backward_axiom, including termination measures, well-founded recursion patterns, and implementation strategy

key_findings: The axiom can be eliminated by constructing a provably saturated BMCS
saturated_modal_backward theorem is ALREADY PROVEN - just needs saturated input
Termination uses Finset.card on unsatisfied Diamond formulas in closure
SubformulaClosure provides finite bound via diamondSubformulas
Total estimated effort: 16-26 hours across 5 phases

missing_implementations.name: saturateFamilies
missing_implementations.description: Iteratively add witness families until saturation, with well-founded termination

mathlib_patterns: Finset.card_lt_card - strict subset implies smaller card
